title: Investigate the Murders

Enter Candulhallow's Tombstones.

We found a note on Figaro Pennygood's corpse instructing his killer to enter Candulhallow's Tombstones with a passphrase - seems as though the Bhaalist cult may be there. We found a note in the killer Dolor's pockets, instructing him to enter Candulhallow's Tombstones with a passphrase - seems the Bhaalist cult may be there. We learned the passphrase we must speak at Candulhallow's Tombstones to meet with the Bhaalist cult.
